feedbacks2019.title: “Great, Exciting Conference! You’ll Get High-Quality Insights from UDC.”
feedbacks2019.title_m: “Great, Exciting Conference! You’ll Get High-Quality Insights from UDC.”
feedbacks2019.name: Leemon Baird
feedbacks2019.description: “It’s been great! I’ve enjoyed talking with people and seeing various ideas from the exhibition. There’s a lot going on. The questions that audience ask are very interesting and insightful. Such an exciting place to be!”
feedbacks2019.description_m: “It’s been great! I’ve enjoyed talking with people and seeing various ideas from the exhibition. There’s a lot going on. The questions that audience ask are very interesting and insightful. Such an exciting place to be!”

feedbacks2019.title: “Best Organized Conference Where Everyone can Learn from Each Other”
feedbacks2019.title_m: “Best Organized Conference Where Everyone can Learn from Each Other”
feedbacks2019.name: Houman Haddad
feedbacks2019.company: (United Nations World Food Programme Head of Emerging Technologies)
feedbacks2019.description: “For one thing, it’s the best organized conference I’ve ever been to by far. The other thing is that it has non-commercial quality. Everyone who has come here is to explain what they’re doing, what they’re excited about, and more importantly to learn from each other. It’s a great feeling to participate in this conference.”
feedbacks2019.description_m: “For one thing, it’s the best organized conference I’ve ever been to by far. The other thing is that it has non-commercial quality. Everyone who has come here is to explain what they’re doing, what they’re excited about, and more importantly to learn from each other. It’s a great feeling to participate in this conference.”

feedbacks2019.title: “A Different Level of Sophistication”
feedbacks2019.name: Kevin Abosch
feedbacks2019.description: “UDC is calm and collected with sophisticated audience. It has a different level of sophistication compared to other events. Also, I was taken care of really nicely, was able to engage with other presenters. The organizers paid attention to details and that was really helpful.”
feedbacks2019.description_m: “UDC is calm and collected with sophisticated audience. It has a different level of sophistication compared to other events. Also, I was taken care of really nicely, was able to engage with other presenters. The organizers paid attention to details and that was really helpful.”

feedbacks2019.title: “Serious, Professional, and Cool “
feedbacks2019.name: Yan Zhu
feedbacks2019.description: “The people at UDC are more serious and professional. Also, the contents and layout of the event was impressive. It’s much more well-organized with a lot of places to take photos. Very cool!”
feedbacks2019.description_m: “The people at UDC are more serious and professional. Also, the contents and layout of the event was impressive. It’s much more well-organized with a lot of places to take photos. Very cool!”

feedbacks2019.title: “Such a Privilege to be at UDC, a Fascinating Event with Great Production!”
feedbacks2019.title_m: “Such a Privilege to be at UDC, a Fascinating Event with Great Production!”
feedbacks2019.name: Timothy Li
feedbacks2019.description: “It’s been great! I’ve enjoyed talking with people and seeing various ideas from the exhibition. There’s a lot going on. The questions that audience ask are very interesting and insightful. Such an exciting place to be!”
feedbacks2019.description_m: “It’s been great! I’ve enjoyed talking with people and seeing various ideas from the exhibition. There’s a lot going on. The questions that audience ask are very interesting and insightful. Such an exciting place to be!”

feedbacks2019.title: “What is Special About UDC is Spirit of Developers.”
feedbacks2019.title_m: “What is Special About UDC is Spirit of Developers.”
feedbacks2019.name: Jan Junge
feedbacks2019.description: “What is special about UDC is the spirit of the developers, who are open to share their experience and best practices. Come join here to take advantage of what it has to offer! If you are a speaker, don’t be afraid; just do it! People will love it. You will love it. It’s a great experience.”
feedbacks2019.description_m: “What is special about UDC is the spirit of the developers, who are open to share their experience and best practices. Come join here to take advantage of what it has to offer! If you are a speaker, don’t be afraid; just do it! People will love it. You will love it. It’s a great experience.”

feedbacks2019.title: “Awesome, Vibrant and Energetic”
feedbacks2019.name: Alexander Höptner
feedbacks2019.description: “It’s an awesome experience. UDC is vibrant and full of energy. It’s all about experience; there is no probing or testing. People here know what they are talking about, and really into the topic. What an experience!”
feedbacks2019.description_m: “It’s an awesome experience. UDC is vibrant and full of energy. It’s all about experience; there is no probing or testing. People here know what they are talking about, and really into the topic. What an experience!”

feedbacks2019.title: “UDC Connects All Those Thinking About the Future of Blockchain.”
feedbacks2019.title_m: “UDC Connects All Those Thinking About the Future of Blockchain.”
feedbacks2019.name: Richard Choi
feedbacks2019.description: “It felt like everyone at UDC were having meaningful conversations on real issues facing blockchain technology, rather than just talking about their own achievements. I also had the opportunity to interact with other speakers from various fields, like Kevin Abosch, and it was truly inspiring.”
feedbacks2019.description_m: “It felt like everyone at UDC were having meaningful conversations on real issues facing blockchain technology, rather than just talking about their own achievements. I also had the opportunity to interact with other speakers from various fields, like Kevin Abosch, and it was truly inspiring.”

feedbacks2019.title: “Healthy Discussions on How Blockchain will be Utilized in the Future.”
feedbacks2019.title_m: “Healthy Discussions on How Blockchain will be Utilized in the Future.”
feedbacks2019.name: Jason Han
feedbacks2019.description: “There were definitely more developers and a wider range of programs compared to UDC 2018. This year’s event focused on real cases and not just on the technology, with great discussions on how the technology should be applied.”
feedbacks2019.description_m: “There were definitely more developers and a wider range of programs compared to UDC 2018. This year’s event focused on real cases and not just on the technology, with great discussions on how the technology should be applied.”

feedbacks2019.title: “A Conference that Offers Both Motivation and Insight”
feedbacks2019.title_m: “A Conference that Offers Both Motivation and Insight”
feedbacks2019.name: Yong-Ku Lee
feedbacks2019.description: “What makes UDC special is that it features not just practical discussions, but philosophical ones as well, such as the future of the blockchain technology and where it should be headed. I’m originally an AI developer, so the networking events were a great way for me to gain meaningful insight from blockchain experts.”
feedbacks2019.description_m: “What makes UDC special is that it features not just practical discussions, but philosophical ones as well, such as the future of the blockchain technology and where it should be headed. I’m originally an AI developer, so the networking events were a great way for me to gain meaningful insight from blockchain experts.”

feedbacks2019.title: “Gaining First-Hand Experience of Various Blockchain Services was Quite Instructive .”
feedbacks2019.title_m: “Gaining First-Hand Experience of Various Blockchain Services was Quite Instructive .”
feedbacks2019.name: Woo-Ram Son
feedbacks2019.description: “Among all the UDC 2019 programs, I’ve really enjoyed the exhibition zones and the hands-on sessions. It was great to gain first-hand experience of new blockchain services developed by different companies.”
feedbacks2019.description_m: “Among all the UDC 2019 programs, I’ve really enjoyed the exhibition zones and the hands-on sessions. It was great to gain first-hand experience of new blockchain services developed by different companies.”

feedbacks2019.title: “Well-Structured, Professional and Meaningful”
feedbacks2019.name: Sang-Sik Joo
feedbacks2019.description: “UDC was well-structured and professional. I’m happy to see this conference establish itself as a major event for blockchain developers. I was honored to be part of this meaningful event.”
feedbacks2019.description_m: “UDC was well-structured and professional. I’m happy to see this conference establish itself as a major event for blockchain developers. I was honored to be part of this meaningful event.”

feedbacks2019.title: “UDC is Always Fun!”
feedbacks2019.name: Hye-Young Park
feedbacks2019.description: “This year’s hands-on session was joined by many developers who are tackling practical issues related to blockchain technology. Much like last year, it was a fun and exciting experience for industry professionals like me.”
feedbacks2019.description_m: “This year’s hands-on session was joined by many developers who are tackling practical issues related to blockchain technology. Much like last year, it was a fun and exciting experience for industry professionals like me.”

feedbacks2019.title: “Hands-on is a Great Session for Non-Developers As Well.”
feedbacks2019.title_m: “Hands-on is a Great Session for Non-Developers As Well.”
feedbacks2019.name: Young Yoon
feedbacks2019.description: “Even though I am not a developer, I had no problem following the instructor.”
feedbacks2019.description_m: “Even though I am not a developer, I had no problem following the instructor.”

feedbacks2019.title: “UDC is a Conference You Want to Attend Every Year.”
feedbacks2019.title_m: “UDC is a Conference You Want to Attend Every Year.”
feedbacks2019.name: Intime
feedbacks2019.description: “Everyone knows about UDC and I’ve been here both years. I’m already excited for UDC 2020 because they do a great job of choosing pertinent themes.”
feedbacks2019.description_m: “Everyone knows about UDC and I’ve been here both years. I’m already excited for UDC 2020 because they do a great job of choosing pertinent themes.”

feedbacks2019.title: “UDC is a Great Event for Both Developers and Non-Developers”
feedbacks2019.title_m: “UDC is a Great Event for Both Developers and Non-Developers”
feedbacks2019.name: Jae-Yoon Shin
feedbacks2019.company: (Sogang University Student major in American Culture)
feedbacks2019.description: “Blockchain isn’t an easy subject to understand, but they did a great job of explaining how the technology will impact end-users like me. Even though there aren’t a lot of mainstream services, it’s obvious that blockchain’s potential is immense.”
feedbacks2019.description_m: “Blockchain isn’t an easy subject to understand, but they did a great job of explaining how the technology will impact end-users like me. Even though there aren’t a lot of mainstream services, it’s obvious that blockchain’s potential is immense.”

feedbacks2019.title: “It was an Eye-Opening Experience!”
feedbacks2019.name: Sang-Min Lee
feedbacks2019.description: “UDC completely changed my preconceived notions regarding blockchain. I thought it was a finance-related technology, but I learned that it’s also being widely adopted in industries such as consumer goods and the energy.”
feedbacks2019.description_m: “UDC completely changed my preconceived notions regarding blockchain. I thought it was a finance-related technology, but I learned that it’s also being widely adopted in industries such as consumer goods and the energy.”

feedbacks2019.title: “I’m Excited for Future UDCs”
feedbacks2019.name: Milla Choi
feedbacks2019.description: “I’m looking forward to how UDC will evolve in the future. This year’s theme of ‘Proof of Services’ provided a great opportunity to learn about how blockchain technology is impacting our lives. I also enjoyed the diverse array of events.”
feedbacks2019.description_m: “I’m looking forward to how UDC will evolve in the future. This year’s theme of ‘Proof of Services’ provided a great opportunity to learn about how blockchain technology is impacting our lives. I also enjoyed the diverse array of events.”

feedbacks.title: “An Eventthat Brings Developers Together”
feedbacks.name: Dawn Song
feedbacks.description: “It’s a great event. I think we should organize more events like this where we bring the developers together and really talk about the technology. It’s a way for the developer community to help everyone better understand cutting edge technology.”

feedbacks.title: “A GreatDeveloper Conference”
feedbacks.name: Da Hongfei
feedbacks.description: “It’s great. NEO is a technology platform, so we love to be at developer conferences, and UDC is a good one.”

feedbacks.title: “Upbit Developer Conference 2018  Comes to an End Successfull”
feedbacks.title_m: “Upbit Developer Conference 2018  Comes to an End Successfull”
feedbacks.name: etnews
feedbacks.description: ‘Upbit Developer Conference (UDC) 2018’, which had Chairman Song Chi-young of Dunamu, CEO Lee Sirgoo of Dunamu, and CEO Bill Shihara of Bittrex in attendance, came to an end on the 14th. UDC took place at ICC (International Convention Center) JEJUon the 13th and the 14th...While blockchain events in the past were simply Meetup events where companies introduced their coins, UDC 2018 centered on developers that introduced technical skills and practicality.
feedbacks.description_m: ‘Upbit Developer Conference (UDC) 2018’, which had Chairman Sirgoo Lee of Dunamu, CEO Lee Seok-woo of Dunamu, and CEO Bill Shihara of Bittrex in attendance, came to an end on the 14th. ...

feedbacks.title: “A Conference Actually Focused  on Blockchain Infrastructure”
feedbacks.title_m: “A Conference Actually Focused  on Blockchain Infrastructure”
feedbacks.name: Travis Moore
feedbacks.description: “Unlike a lot of traditional crypto conferences, UDC is actually focused on blockchain infrastructure which is something I think we really need.”

feedbacks.title: “Great Chance to Meet  the Korean Blockchain Community”
feedbacks.title_m: “Great Chance to Meet  the Korean Blockchain Community”
feedbacks.name: Benjamin Bollen
feedbacks.description: “It was the first time I’ve had a chance to meet the Korean blockchain community and I loved it. Also, the organization was splendid and I was blown away.”

feedbacks.title: “A Venuefor Stimulating Interactions”
feedbacks.name: Carl Youngblood
feedbacks.description: “It was amazing. The interactions I had with the attendees at UDC 2018 were really stimulating”

feedbacks.title: “A Very Well-organizedEvent”
feedbacks.name: Edward Greve
feedbacks.description: “It was great. A lot of interesting people to talk with, and also UDC was very organized and everything was done really well”

feedbacks.title: “High-quality Presentersand Many Attendees”
feedbacks.name: Qi Zhou
feedbacks.description: “It was very well-organized, and the presenters were very high quality. There were a lot of attendees, so I was very happy to be there and present our technology.”

feedbacks.title: “Upbit Developer Conference Opens in Jeju Island, Dunamu Chairman Makes Welcome Remarks”
feedbacks.title_m: “Upbit Developer Conference Opensin Jeju Island, Dunamu ChairmanMakes Welcome Remarks”
feedbacks.name: Blockt
feedbacks.description: South Korea’s Jeju Island was painted red by a global community of blockchain enthusiasts on Thursday, Sept 13, as the inaugural Upbit Developer Conference 2018 (UDC 2018) started off with a bang. Founder and Chairman of Dunamu Inc. Chi-Hyung Song took to the podium to... welcome the attendees. The conference has lined up several major blockchain figures in the industry to address the gathering, including Onchain cofounder Jun Li and Bittrex CEO Bill Shihara, among others.

feedbacks.title: “Opportunity to Present along with Globally Renowned Blockchain Experts”
feedbacks.title_m: “Opportunity to Presentalong with Globally RenownedBlockchain Experts”
feedbacks.name: Yong-gil Kwon
feedbacks.description: “It was an honor to present along with so many globally renowned blockchain experts. It was truly rewarding and meaningful to be able to talk in depth about the work we’re doing.”

feedbacks.title: “Incredibly Professionaland Very Well-organized”
feedbacks.name: Gerard Moroney
feedbacks.description: “I was very impressed. The UDC team was incredibly professional. It was very well-presented and organized and I was very pleased with everything I saw.”

feedbacks.title: “Very Enjoyable”
feedbacks.name: Benedict Chan
feedbacks.description: “It was very enjoyable. Everyone was trying to see how they can apply the blockchain and get adoption there.It was a lot about building, and I like that a lot.”

feedbacks.title: “UDC 2018 is proof that blockchaincould be the next internet”
feedbacks.title_m: “UDC 2018 is proof that blockchaincould be the next internet”
feedbacks.name: Joonang Daily
feedbacks.description: “Over 700 people gathered in ICC Jeju’s Tamna Hall on the early morning of the 13th for the two-day Upbit Developer Conference. Blockchain experts from around the world shared a common theme at the conference: the need for an everyday service based on blockchain ...

feedbacks.title: “A Great Opportunity to Learn about Dynamic and Fascinating Blockchain Projects”
feedbacks.title_m: “A Great Opportunity to Learnabout Dynamic and FascinatingBlockchain Projects”
feedbacks.name: Heejo Lee
feedbacks.description: “UDC was a great opportunity to learn firsthand about a wide variety of dynamic and fascinating blockchain projects”

feedbacks.title: “In-depth Presentationsand Audience Questions”
feedbacks.name: Brian Cheong
feedbacks.description: “With most of the attendees being developers, both the presentations and audience questions were really in-depth. It was a very productive conference.”

feedbacks.title: “Meaningful Discussions on the Present and Future of Blockchain Technology”
feedbacks.title_m: “Meaningful Discussionson the Present and Futureof Blockchain Technology”
feedbacks.name: Jae-hyun Park
feedbacks.description: “A lot of other conferences focus more on the investment aspect, so to be able come together with other developers to discuss the present and future of blockchain technology was truly meaningful.”

feedbacks.title: “Dunamu Chairman: Developers are the true foundation of the blockchain ecosystem”
feedbacks.title_m: “Dunamu Chairman: Developersare the true foundationof the blockchain ecosystem”
feedbacks.name: ZDNet Korea
feedbacks.description: “Developers that are currently imagining and preparing for the mass adoption of blockchain technology will end up being the main players of the ecosystem.” ...
feedbacks.description_m: “Developers that are currently imagining and preparing for the mass adoption of blockchain technology will end up being the main players of the ecosystem.”

infos.val: Blockchain developers, service providers, and enthusiasts
English, Korean (English-Korean simultaneous interpretation will be provided.)
Grand Hyatt Incheon, Incheon, South Korea
Blockchain developers, service providers, and enthusiasts
English, Korean (English-Korean simultaneous interpretation will be provided.)

texts:
Upbit Developer Conference is a true developer-centric event where
participants can engage with likeminded developers and share their passion for blockchain technology through the free exchange of ideas.

Dunamu, the operator of digital asset exchange Upbit, hosted the inaugural Upbit Developer <br class="mobile-only"/>Conference in 2018 in an effort to foster and grow the blockchain ecosystem. It is one of the first conferences in the world solely dedicated to blockchain development.

UDC 2019 featured numerous services born from the ideas and hard works of blockchain developers, offering a terrific opportunity
to see first-hand how blockchain technology is shaping the future.

UDC 2019 brought together developers from around the globe for meaningful exchange of ideas with world-class experts, as well productive networking events and hands-on programs for the next <br class="mobile-only"/>generation of developers.

concepts.title: A Communication Platform for Developers
descriptions: New technology and trends that matter to developers
Numerous events to share and exchange ideas

concepts.title: In-depth Exchange of Ideas
descriptions: Speakers that provide real and applicable insight
Diverse formats to allow active exchange of ideas for developers

concepts.title: Where We Can Get Together
descriptions: Meet world-class blockchain developers and build a strong network
A variety of events to engage with other developers

2020.subTitle: Solving the Future with Blockchain
2020.description:
With the theme of ‘return blockchain * future;’
UDC 2020 discusses the role and impact of blockchain in the pandemic era
and where the industry is headed in 2021 and beyond.
2020.description_m:
With the theme of ‘return blockchain * future;’
UDC 2020 discusses the role and impact
of blockchain in the pandemic era
and where the industry is headed
in 2021 and beyond.
2020.whatIs: Upbit Developer Conference(UDC) is a 'true developer-centric event' where participants can engage with likeminded developers and share their passion for blockchain techonology through the free exchange of ideas.
2020.whatIsM: Upbit Developer Conference(UDC) is a 'true developer-centric event' where participants can engage with likeminded developers and share their passion for blockchain techonology through the free exchange of ideas.
aboutFirst:
As the global pandemic continues
to impact all of us in 2020,

family gatherings,
dinners with friends,
and walks around the neighborhood
are no longer natural parts of our daily lives.

The pandemic has disrupted the way we live and
the way we view the world in immeasurable ways.
aboutSec:
'Solving the Future with Blockchain',
the online-exclusive UDC 2020 examines
what answers blockchain can provide and
how the technology will shape our future.
